mapper.select:
SELECT S.AUCTION_NO AS auctionNo, A.AUCTION_PRODUCT AS auctionProduct, A.AUCTION_PRICE AS auctionPrice, A.AUCTION_END AS auctionEnd FROM SELL_FORM S LEFT JOIN AUCTION A ON (S.AUCTION_NO=A.AUCTION_NO) WHERE A.FARM_NO=#{farmNo}
AND A.auction_product like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
AND A.auction_no like '%'||#{keyWord}||'%'
ORDER BY 4 DESC
